name: phonebook
description: I am using this repo to share my progress for a Full Stack Web Development course (Backend modules)

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd /Users/mario/Desktop/Projects/Fullstack\ Web\ Development\ Course/FullStack-WebDev-Frontend/part3/project-phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build /Users/mario/Desktop/Projects/Fullstack\ Web\ Development\ Course/FullStack-WebDev-Backend/FullStack-WebDev-Backend/part4/project-phonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
